question:
In reference to the recent introduction of the SATHI scheme, consider the following statements:
  1. The scheme is for improving access to scientific infrastructure.
  2. It was introduced by the ministry of science and technology.
  3. It is to be available only to the academia and researchers.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The SATHI scheme is Sophisticated Analytical and Technical Help Institute. It is to help in addressing the issues of accessibility and maintenance of scientific infrastructure by its sharing and professional management. It will enable access to high end analytical testing services. Statement 2 is correct: The SATHI scheme is being implemented by the department of science and technology (DST) under the ministry of science and technology. It is to set up 3 centres in the first phase at IIT Delhi, IIT Kharagpur and BHU, Varanasi. Statement 3 is incorrect: The infrastructure under this scheme will be made available not only to the academia and the researchers but also to start- ups, MSMEs and other industrial players. The 3 centres are to be established at a cost of 375 crore INR and 5 more are to come up in the next 4 years.
